channel.title: Must Read Very Important
channel.description: :confused: im very annoyed ive been trying to play mopar allday n its different like every server u have to download something for it used to not be like that every server when i log in even after i download client jus says loading... n other ones as soon as i click log me out maybe im dowloading wrong after download iz complete it says open file or save file what do i do? ive been saving to documets n still not working please post THANK YOU

item.title: Must Read Very Important
item.dc:creator: @weinerboy weinerboy
item.description:
@weinerboy wrote:

Well i think it was jus that server but ive tried bout 5 servers they all dont work they all just say loading please wait n wont let me play n i dowload the servers and winrar can u jus give me a server that is gud that will work n i dont have to download a cliet n if i do tell me how. jesus moparscape scripters r idiots these days[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2009, 04:52:34 pm[/size][hr]alright i give up this is so stupid wy the **** did u make everything so complicated so that only nerds can play… i tryed multiple servers they all say error t2 65-86 etc. i downloaded the clients, n still dont work

Read full topic

item.title: Must Read Very Important
item.dc:creator: @weinerboy weinerboy
item.description:
@weinerboy wrote:

you wree correct it said open with winrar thannks alot im tryin now[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2009, 04:11:04 pm[/size][hr]dude this is so dumb i saved to winrar then downloaded or w.e then came up to the download title n i did extract to desktop the dowload is complete n on desktop n u said click run script its a file u cant run it n i tryed to log in on moparscape again on the same server n it logs me out right away
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2009, 04:12:19 pm[/size][hr]n it says error t2 n a bunch of numbers

Read full topic

item.title: Must Read Very Important
item.dc:creator: @aquatizscape aquatizscape
item.description:
@aquatizscape wrote:

First of all, you need to download Winrar. Google download winrar, and click the one that has the site as rarlabs. Then, Download it and everything. now, re download the client you wanted to use, and click open. Winrar should now pop up, and you click extract at the top right corner. extract it to your desktop, and then wait for it to go. Go to your desktop, click run client, and wa-la, you downloded a client. hope i helped.

Read full topic
